title: The Knights Rose
description: Hurt by love, Prudence Rose leaves the craze of the city to head off to her father's farm. Needing the seclusion to get her head together. But adventure soon finds her, Prue finds and injured man in her barn... Deciding on helping the man who cannot recall a thing about his past except his name... Prue soon falls in love with the sexy man who she saved... He was her dream man... Until his past catches up with him. Now Prue finds herself with a man who has kept dark secrets from her, a criminal who seems intent on keeping her for himself.  Warning: This book contains material of sex and submission and violence. It is recommended for viewers 18 years and over.
author: E.L. Beth
